sections.general: chef professional summary to obtain a position within an environment that offers a challenge and the capability to gain more knowledge about the company. to be given the opportunity to grow within the company and the chance to progress in my career. once a job is obtained within a specific organization, to have the ability to help the company advance productively and efficiently.
